description: 7 folded maps in box ; 26 x 17 cm
Sheets 1 to 7 and 9 to 12 are bound with Report of progress on the explorations and surveys up to January, 1874
Sheets No. 8, 10, 11, 13-16 were issued later than the Report
Sheet No. 8. Map from the Pacific Ocean across the Rocky Mountain Zone
Sheet 10. Map of the Country between the Provinces of Ontario, Quebec and Manitoba

Sheet 11. Sketch Plan of the Mouth of the Saskatchewan River from Hinds Exploring Expedition also Plan and Section of the Mossy Portage between Cedar Lake and Lake Winnipegoosis (sic) the Meadow Portage between Lake Winnipegoosis (sic) and Lake Manitoba from a Survey by Henry B. Smith
Sheet No. 13. Chart of Thunder Bay, Lake Superior, surveyed by Admiral Bayfield, R.N
Sheet No. 14. Chart of Nepigon Bay, Lake Superior, surveyed by Admiral Bayfield, R.N
Sheet No. 15. Plans of the River Kaministiquia ; Plan of Lake Ellen and Nipigon Bay made in connection with the Canadian Pacific Railway Survey
Sheet No. 16. Chart of the Coast of British Columbia North of Latitude 51. Chiefly from Capt Vancouver's Surveys in 1792 and 1793

McGill Library's Rare Books and Special Collections, Map Collection : 2 copies missing Sheet 10.
